summary: REQ-1 appears implemented in App hero via a direct external image URL with preloading/fallback logic and an intended 25% dark-blue overlay + bottom-justified background positioning. REQ-2 is partially implemented: the create-instance flow now passes the submitted proposal name upward and ProposalsSection can auto-open a specified proposal, but the diff summary does not clearly evidence React Query invalidation/refresh wiring nor the follow-up UI entry point from the proposal detail view. REQ-3 adds a smoke-test markdown doc, but it is largely a template with "Observed Result" fields left unfilled, so it does not yet record actual results.

missing_requirements.reason: The diff shows navigation wiring (proposalToOpen auto-open) but does not show the submit mutation invalidating/refetching the proposals query or otherwise guaranteeing the newly submitted proposal appears without reload.

missing_requirements.requirement: From the newly created proposal detail view, the user can reach the instance-dependent follow-up UI that already exists (e.g., the issue project/tasks flow) for that proposal/instance identifier.
missing_requirements.reason: The diff summary does not include the Proposal Detail implementation; therefore there is no direct evidence in the provided modified file snippets that the proposal detail view exposes a follow-up entry point (e.g., "Open Issue Project").

missing_requirements.requirement: Record the end-to-end smoke test steps and the observed result for each step in a repo document, including performing at least one instance-dependent follow-up action and noting any failures/fixes or known issues.
